title: Debian packages for Gazebo 3.0 and ROS gazebo packages

content.raw:
Some groups want to install recent version of Gazebo (hopefully Gazebo 3.0) and ROS together from debian packages to use multiple physics engines feature. However, according to [wiki](http://gazebosim.org/wiki/Install/Gazebo_and_ROS), ROS currently works with Gazebo 1.9.x. In order to use recent version of Gazebo and ROS together, the user should build them from source.

When it will be possible to use recent version of Gazebo (Gazebo 3.0) and ROS from debian packages?
content.html:
